en.HELP_MESSAGE: You can say tell me an interesting fact, or, you can say exit... What can I help you with?
en.HELP_REPROMPT: What can I help you with?
en.FALLBACK_MESSAGE: The Interesting Black People Facts skill can't help you with that.  It can help you discover facts about black people if you say tell me an interesting fact. What can I help you with?
en.FALLBACK_REPROMPT: What can I help you with?
FACTS: Barrack Obama was the first black president and the 44th president of the United States of America.  He won the nobel peace prize in 2009
